Text:
function RYU_EP05_02()
    -- .序章-2【1月第1週】「いつか終わる幸せ」
    SaveData.Title = "いつか終わる幸せ"

    -- //BG：龍宮院邸
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG006aa")
FILTER_SCREEN(2)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)
    -- //effect：セピア加工

PLAY_BGM("BGM09.wav",0)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0790.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "When speaking about the Ryuguuin family's educational policies, I must quote a saying that has been passed down through our bloodline for generations." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0791.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It is the phrase, 'A woman must devote herself completely.'" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0792_1.0.1.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Apparently, it originates from a Confucian scholar who named the Ryuguuin family, and my family has followed this phrase faithfully, providing girls with a thorough education whenever they are born." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0793.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That high standard of education resulted in sending out good wives who support their husbands both mentally and physically, enabling the Ryuguuin family to form blood ties across many fields." ]])

    -- //BG：繁華街
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004aa")
FILTER_SCREEN(0)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)
    -- //BU：ウラン（通常）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1944.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "A political marriage, you mean...?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0794.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. To put it simply, that's exactly right." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0795.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "The 'Ryuguya,' which began as a traveler’s inn during the Sengoku period, is now renowned as a long-established restaurant, but just running a restaurant alone would have limited its growth." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0796.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "By expanding the business through diplomacy using daughters, it grew from a mere eatery to the head of the food service industry, Ryugu Holdings." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0797.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "And I, too, have received education from a young age to ensure I do not fall out of the Ryuguuin family lineage." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //CG：着飾されたウラン
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV016aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010" , 1000,false)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0798.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "By the time I became aware, I was appointed as a bridge to the Jujo Group, the one with the longest history among the six major groups." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0799.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "In other words, an engagement was determined with an influential figure from the Jujo Group." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1945.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "W-was your marriage already decided when you were so young?! You couldn’t have made any decisions yourself!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0800.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It’s not for the person to decide. The role of deciding belongs to the family; the individual's will does not matter." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0801.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "When I graduate from Yuriai Private Academy, I am prepared to go through the marriage procedures with the partner my family has chosen, without any objections, just as told." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1946.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "S-so right after graduation, marriage...? And without your own will in the matter?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1947.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "That’s wrong! What do they think Uran-san’s life is? She wasn’t born just to continue the family line!" ]])

    -- //BG：繁華街
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG004aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)
    -- //BU：ウラン（悲しみ）
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0802.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Thank you for your kind words, Erika-san. However... those objections would not carry weight with them." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0803.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Artificial flowers that do not bloom by their own will tend to feel bland. Still, there are always some people in the world who are satisfied with that kind of charm." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0804.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Supply arises because there is demand. If there were none, the Ryuguuin family wouldn’t raise daughters like us." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01fc")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0805.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "There are apparently mountains of people who want me as their wife. Hehe... I’m curious what would happen if they got to know my true personality." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1948.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Just because there’s demand… treating your daughter like a product. I just can’t understand it or forgive it." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0806.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That idea is reflected even in my name, have you noticed?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1949.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh? You mean the name 'Uran'? It’s written with the kanji for 'feather' and 'orchid,' right?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0807.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. But the original reading of this name is '<r=ハラン>羽蘭</r>'. It carries the wish that I live like the '<r=はらん>葉蘭</r>' from which it originated." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1950.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ha, Horan...? I’ve never heard of that flower." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0808.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san must have seen it at least once. Horan—which is also called 'baran'—is used as decoration in sushi and bento boxes." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1951.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Ba-baran? The green jagged thing in sushi lunch boxes?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("erika_1952.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I’ve only ever seen the plastic ones, but was that originally a real plant?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0809.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes, exactly that baran. As with you, Erika-san, many people don’t know that decoration comes from an actual plant." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0810.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Even fewer have actually seen the flower itself." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0811.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It keeps its beauty within, neither standing out nor asserting itself, only making others shine. Baran is precisely how the Ryuguuin family idealizes a daughter's way of life." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1953.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "...Uran-san, is living like that really okay?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1954.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Don’t you want to live your own life freely, just like everyone else, for the things you love?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0812.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "That, is..." ]])

    MSG([[ Uran-san faltered in her answer, her expression clouding as if troubled. ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0813.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I do not intend to deny my family’s teachings. If the Ryuguuin family has grown in that way, then I understand that obeying is the role of the eldest daughter." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0814.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "No, I was trying to accept it. As the eldest daughter of the Ryuguuin family, I kept telling myself I must comply with my family's customs." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0815.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It was you... Erika-san, who changed that about me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ca")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1955.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Huh? M-me?" ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0816.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Yes. Thanks to you, Erika-san, I decided to live selfishly at least during my school years, to love freely, and to express my honest feelings." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0817.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "If not for that... I wouldn’t have been able to do such a shameless thing in front of everyone." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1956.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "I-I suppose that might be true." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Remembering the kiss after the Princess Election, my face heats up as well. ]])

    MSG([[ Even now, as lovers, that incident still makes me happily embarrassed and my head feel like it's boiling. ]])

    MSG([[ Though I was excited, I think I acted quite boldly. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01da")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0818.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "...I’m sorry, Erika-san, but I will probably be taken in as a wife by the Rokujou family soon after graduating from Yuriai Private Academy." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0819.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "It is a fate I cannot resist alone. The centuries-old Ryuguuin family arrangements cannot be defied." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ea")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0820.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "But as I told you before, Erika-san, it’s different while I’m here at Yuriai Private Academy. While in this birdcage, no one can bind me." ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0821.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "As long as you’re by my side... I will never let go of your hand. You are the most important person to me." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("uran_0822.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "More than any man in the world, to me, you are a prince." ]])

    MSG([[ Saying that, Uran-san enveloped my hand with hers. ]])

    MSG([[ Looking at her delicate, petal-like smile, my cheeks grow warm while I feel my heart also chilling. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1957.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (If Uran-san knew I was really a boy... what would she think?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I’m deceiving Uran-san, who trusts me so deeply. It is something that can never be forgiven. ]])

    MSG([[ Yet, I’m not sure if telling her everything is the right thing to do. ]])

    MSG([[ She wants to spend her remaining time happily, and it would be too cruel to ruin that with my lies. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1958.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (If I keep lying until the end, I can avoid hurting Uran-san.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ba")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1959.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (After all, the cause was me approaching Uran-san without serious resolve. I have to keep playing the role of the “ideal girlfriend” whenever I’m with her.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0823.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Erika-san...? Your expression looks troubled. What’s wrong?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01ea")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1960.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Sorry. I was just thinking that if I married a cute princess like Uran-san, I’d probably become the most targeted prince in the world." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_RYU01ha")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0824.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "Oh, Erika-san..." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01da")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1961.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (I’m sorry, Uran-san. Though I lie so much, please let me stay by your side.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_ERI01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1962.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 (While I’m by your side, “I” will always remain “Erika Ikusa.”) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ I silently make a vow in my heart, careful not to let Uran-san notice. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- 　　　　◆
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    -- //駅前（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002ba")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    -- //BU：エリカ・通常
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,true)

    MSG([[ Walking beside Erika-san, I thought about what lies ahead. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0825.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 (Erika-san accepted everything I told her without prying.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ The Ryuguuin family values are outdated. I myself, who was taught those values from a young age, must be terribly twisted. ]])

    MSG([[ I fully understand that. But for the sake of my mother, who lost her life to give birth to me, I cannot defy those teachings. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //effect：セピア加工
    -- //CG：着飾されたウラン
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "EV016aa")
FILTER_SCREEN(2)
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask010" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ My mother passed away shortly after giving birth to me. ]])

    MSG([[ My family naturally treated me strictly, and my grandmother, who took on my education instead of my busy father, said this every day. ]])

    MSG([[ —To preserve the Ryuguuin family tradition, your mother risked her life in childbirth. —You have an obligation to protect the Ryuguuin family. ]])

    MSG([[ Those words, like a curse, still blaze in my mind and won't leave me. ]])

    MSG([[ While longing for freedom, the guilt of living freely after being born at the cost of my mother’s life never disappears. ]])

    -- //effect：なし
    -- //駅前（夕方）
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "BG002ba")
FILTER_SCREEN(0)
LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask009" , 1000,false)
    -- //BU：エリカ・通常

    MSG([[ Maybe I told Erika-san everything because if she ended up hating me, it would be easier. ]])

    MSG([[ But she gave me an unexpected reaction. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01aa")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0826.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 (Though she raised questions, she showed understanding.) ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0827.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 (Truly kind, warm, and wonderful... If only Erika-san were a man, would everything be solved?) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ That thought flickered through my mind, and I sighed at myself. ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01da")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0828.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 (No... it’s not that simple. I was drawn to Erika-san because she’s a woman. Indeed, I showed little interest in Minato-san, who looks similar.) ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

    MSG([[ Because we are both women, I could love her. But because we are both women, we can never be united. ]])

    MSG([[ Fate is truly cruel. If there is a God, I think He must be quite malicious. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ca")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1963.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Uran-san? You’ve been staring at my face. What’s wrong?" ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ga")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0829.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "N-no, I’m sorry." ]])

LAYER_LOAD_FACE("BU_RYU01ha")
PLAY_VOICE("uran_0830.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Uran】
 "I was just feeling grateful that the most beloved person is by my side." ]])
LAYER_LOAD_FACE("")

LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ha")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("erika_1964.wav")
    MSG([[
    【Erika】
 "Haa..." ]])

    MSG([[ Seeing Erika-san blush because of me made me laugh. ]])

LAYER_LOAD(50,"")

    -- //BG：黒バック
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)

    MSG([[ There’s no need for anything special. I just want to keep loving the girl beside me as if it were ordinary and enjoy a peaceful happiness. ]])

    MSG([[ That is what I cannot help but wish for. ]])

    -- 　最終章「ボク姫様と紅蓮の契り」

    -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

    ScenarioManager.Next("RYU_EP05_03")
end
